description:
The journey to return Mia home begins, giving Satou a chance to experiment with the functionality of the fantasy world during the long trip.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Death March kara Hajimaru Shuryou Gakkyoku
La mélodie de chasse venant d’une death march
The Hunting Song That Started with a Death March
デスマーチからはじまる狩猟楽曲
